description:
TransGrid provides safe, reliable, sustainable and affordable electricity transmission services to more than 3.5 million homes and businesses across NSW and the ACT.

At TransGrid we are creating a diverse and inclusive workplace in which all employees feel valued, included and able to contribute to the best of their ability. We strive to reflect in our own workforce the communities in which we live.

Flexible workplace

We offer a wide range of flexible working options that empower our employees to balance all aspects of their lives.  

In the Community

Through our partnerships with UTS and University of Wollongong we play our part in ensuring that female and Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander youth are encouraged to study STEM subjects, to increase the diversity of talent in the wider community.

At a grassroots level, we provide support by contributing to a variety of local initiatives within the communities in which we work. Some of these initiatives include our BeSafeKids program, Community Partnerships Program and various environmental partnerships.    

Accredited White Ribbon workplace

TransGrid are committed to supporting the prevention and response to domestic violence in our society. Be it physical, psychological, economic, social or verbal abuse, we recognise the devastating impact domestic violence has on our mothers, sisters, daughters, friends and colleagues, including on their work and financial security.
